thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Dongxu Optoelectronic's Controlling Shareholder To Buy Company Shares By up To 1.5 BLN Yuan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Dongxu Optoelectronic's Controlling Shareholder To Buy Company Shares By up To 1.5 BLN Yuan

organizations.name: reuters) - dongxu optoelectronic technology co ltd

text:
Feb 2 (Reuters) - Dongxu Optoelectronic Technology Co Ltd :
* SAYS CONTROLLING SHAREHOLDER PLANS TO BUY COMPANY SHARES BY 500 MILLION YUAN TO 1.5 BILLION YUAN ($238.21 million) WITHIN SIX MONTHS Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2BLCCwZ Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.2969 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
